statements: DELETE FROM actors WHERE a_age = 25 AND a_availability = TRUE;
DELETE FROM actors WHERE a_gender = 'M' AND a_previous_perf IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM actors WHERE a_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Actors WHERE actor_id = 100 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM FutureRolesAvailability WHERE actor_id = 200 AND availability_status = 'Available';
DELETE FROM availability WHERE actor_id = 1 AND available_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM performances WHERE movie_title = 'The Matrix' AND role_name = 'Neo';
DELETE FROM Availability WHERE actor_id = 1 AND status = 'available';
DELETE FROM Performances WHERE role = 'Lead Actor' AND movie_title = 'The Great Performance';
